executives.name: Mark Ochieng
executives.title: Chief Executive Officer
executives.bio: A visionary leader with over two decades of experience in the East African retail sector. Mark has spearheaded Powerstar's expansion from a single outlet to a household name, driving strategic growth and operational integrity.
executives.quote: Our success is measured by the trust our customers place in us every single day.

executives.name: Sarah Kamau
executives.title: Operations Director
executives.bio: Sarah is the operational backbone of Powerstar, ensuring seamless logistics and branch efficiency. Her relentless focus on process optimization guarantees that freshness reaches your shelf on time, every time.
executives.quote: Operational excellence is not just a goal; it is the respect we pay to our customers' time and money.

executives.name: David Njoroge
executives.title: Head of Finance
executives.bio: David brings robust financial stewardship to the group, overseeing sustainable growth strategies and fiscal compliance. He ensures that our value promise to customers is backed by a resilient financial foundation.
executives.quote: Profitability is the natural result of serving our community with integrity and consistency.
